Use cases

This document describes how to use the supported use cases:

For application management:

  • Install application configuration
  • Test application configuration installation
  • Install application, i.e. deployment
  • Test application installation
  • Start application
  • Test application start state
  • Stop application
  • Test application stop state
  • Uninstall application, i.e. undeployment
  • Test application configuration uninstallation

For platform management:

  • Install platform software
  • Install platform configuration
  • Update platform configuration (delta)
  • Uninstall platform configuration
  • Uninstall platform software

Stop application

Test application stop state

Uninstall application
